column2:
```r
# time of lab arrival
lme_arrivetime <- lmer(
  cort_B_winlog ~ 
    time_hr +
    scale(crf_time_arrived, scale = FALSE) +
    (time_hr|ID), 
  data = cort_lf
)
anova(lme_base, lme_arrivetime)
```
refitting model(s) with ML (instead of REML)
